named-query.name: Application.findByMemberId
named-query.query: SELECT appl FROM Application appl WHERE appl.member.id=?1 and appl.status in(0,1,2,3,4,5)

named-query.name: RepayPlan.findByMemberIdAndDueDate
named-query.query: SELECT rp FROM RepayPlan rp WHERE rp.dueAmt >?1 and rp.paidPrincipal =0 and rp.member.id=?2 order by rp.dueDate
